input.sentences: the road to the amusement park made me a little anxious since i was excited .
simply looking at the front entrance gave me a good feeling .
walking in the bright sun was extremely tough but it 's a good thing that i had my sunglasses on .
thankfully | my family came across an ice cream and smoothie stand .
i tried one of their special smoothies that 's been sold out a few times in the past .
